title: Senior DevOps & Backend Engineer
tasks: Designed and operated secure CI/CD infrastructure compliant with enterprise-level security standards, enabling frequent production releases.

Collaborated with security and infrastructure teams to define architecture decisions focused on scalability and compliance.

title: DevOps Engineer

title: Junior DevOps / Python Developer
